00069         String Node::GetValueAsString() const
00070         {
00071             return static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->Value();
00072         }

00074         Whole Node::GetValueAsWhole() const
00075         {
00076             Whole Temp=0;
00077             static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->GetValue(&Temp);
00078             return Temp;
00079         }

00082         {

00085             return Temp;

00100         ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00101         // DOM Tree adjusting
00102         ///////////////////////////////////////
00103 
00104         void Node::Clear()
00105         {
00106             if( !this->NoChildren() )
00107             {
00108                 Node* InWork = this->FirstChild();
00109                 Node* OldNode = 0;
00110 
00111                 while( InWork!=this->LastChild() )
00112                 {
00113                     OldNode=InWork;
00114                     InWork=InWork->NextSibling();
00115                     delete OldNode;
00116                 }
00117 
00118                 delete InWork;
00119 
00120                 //TinyXML Seems to require 0 in the the pointers that enclose their tree, So I did this to emulate their clear() function as closely as possible.
00121                 static_cast<TiXmlNode*>(static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->GetBasePointer())->firstChild=0;
00122                 static_cast<TiXmlNode*>(static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->GetBasePointer())->lastChild=0;
00123             }
00124         }
00125 
00126         void Node::AppendChild (Node &AddThis)
00127         {
00128             static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->LinkEndChild( static_cast<ticpp::Node*>(AddThis.Wrapped) );
00129             AddThis.TakeOwnerOfWrapped();
00130         }
00131 
00132         void Node::InsertAfterChild (Node *AfterThis, Node &AddThis)
00133         {
00134             static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->InsertAfterChild( static_cast<ticpp::Node*>(AfterThis->Wrapped), *(static_cast<ticpp::Node*>(AddThis.Wrapped)) );
00135             AddThis.TakeOwnerOfWrapped();
00136         }
00137 
00138         void Node::InsertBeforeChild (Node *BeforeThis, Node &AddThis)
00139         {
00140             static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->InsertBeforeChild( static_cast<ticpp::Node*>(BeforeThis->Wrapped), *(static_cast<ticpp::Node*>(AddThis.Wrapped)) );
00141             AddThis.TakeOwnerOfWrapped();
00142         }

00149             { return Document::GetPointerFromWrapped( static_cast<ticpp::Document*>( static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->GetDocument(true))); }

00151         bool Node::NoChildren () const
00152             { return (static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->NoChildren()); }

00154         Node* Node::Parent() const
00155             { return GetPointerFromWrapped( static_cast<ticpp::Node*>(this->Wrapped)->Parent(true)); }
00156 
00157         Node* Node::FirstChild() const
00158             { return GetPointerFromWrapped(static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->FirstChild()); }
00159 
00160         Node* Node::FirstChild(const std::string &Value) const
00161             { return this->GetPointerFromWrapped(static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->FirstChild(Value)); }
00162 
00163         Node* Node::LastChild() const
00164             { return this->GetPointerFromWrapped(static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->LastChild()); }
00165 
00166         Node* Node::LastChild(const std::string &Value) const
00167             { return this->GetPointerFromWrapped(static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->LastChild(Value)); }
00168 
00169         Node* Node::PreviousSibling() const
00170             { return this->GetPointerFromWrapped(static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->LastChild()); }
00171 
00172         Node* Node::PreviousSibling(const std::string &Value) const
00173             { return this->GetPointerFromWrapped(static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->PreviousSibling(Value)); }
00174 
00175         Node* Node::NextSibling() const
00176             { return this->GetPointerFromWrapped(static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->LastChild()); }
00177 
00178         Node* Node::NextSibling(const std::string &Value) const
00179             { return this->GetPointerFromWrapped(static_cast<ticpp::Node*> (this->Wrapped)->NextSibling(Value)); }

00183         ///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00184         // Type verification and Conversion
00185         ///////////////////////////////////////
00186         Node* Node::GetPointerFromWrapped(ticpp::Node* Meta)
00187         {
00188             //We have no clue what Meta is, but need to wrap it with a legit phys::xml::objectofsomekind
00189             ticpp::Node* Results;
00190             /*Results=dynamic_cast<ticpp::Attribute*>(Meta);
00191             if (Results)
00192                 { Results = Attribute::GetPointerFromWrapped(Results); }*/
00193 
00194             Results = dynamic_cast<ticpp::Comment*>(Meta);
00195             if (Results)
00196                 { return Comment::GetPointerFromWrapped(static_cast<ticpp::Comment*>(Meta)); }
00197 
00198             Results = dynamic_cast<ticpp::Declaration*>(Meta);
00199             if (Results)
00200                 { return Declaration::GetPointerFromWrapped(static_cast<ticpp::Declaration*>(Meta)); }
00201 
00202             Results = dynamic_cast<ticpp::Document*>(Meta);
00203             if (Results)
00204                 { return Document::GetPointerFromWrapped(static_cast<ticpp::Document*>(Meta)); }
00205 
00206             Results = dynamic_cast<ticpp::Element*>(Meta);
00207             if (Results)
00208                 { return Element::GetPointerFromWrapped(static_cast<ticpp::Element*>(Meta)); }
00209 
00210             Results = dynamic_cast<ticpp::StylesheetReference*>(Meta);
00211             if (Results)
00212                 { return StylesheetReference::GetPointerFromWrapped(static_cast<ticpp::StylesheetReference*>(Meta)); }
00213 
00214             Results = dynamic_cast<ticpp::Text*>(Meta);
00215             if (Results)
00216                 { return Text::GetPointerFromWrapped(static_cast<ticpp::Text*>(Meta)); }
00217 
00218             throw Exception("Internal Node is of unknown type, We cannot cast");
00219             return 0;
00220         }
00221 
00222         void Node::ThrowIfMismatchingType(XMLComponentType TypeItShouldBe, Node* NodeToCheck)
00223         {
00224             if(TypeItShouldBe == NodeToCheck->GetType())
00225             {
00226                 return;
00227             }else{
00228                 std::stringstream Temp;
00229                 Temp << "The phys::xml::Node is not of type phys::xml::" << GetTypeAsString(TypeItShouldBe) << ", it is a: " << NodeToCheck->GetTypeAsString();
00230                 throw Exception(Temp.str());
00231             }
00232         }
00233 
00234         Document* Node::ToDocument()
00235         {
00236             ThrowIfMismatchingType(Base::isDocument, this);
00237             return static_cast<Document*> (this);
00238         }
00239 
00240         Element* Node::ToElement()
00241         {
00242             ThrowIfMismatchingType(Base::isElement, this);
00243             return static_cast<Element*> (this);
00244         }
00245 
00246         Comment* Node::ToComment()
00247         {
00248             ThrowIfMismatchingType(Base::isComment, this);
00249             return static_cast<Comment*> (this);
00250         }
00251 
00252         Text* Node::ToText()
00253         {
00254             ThrowIfMismatchingType(Base::isText, this);
00255             return static_cast<Text*> (this);
00256         }
00257 
00258         Declaration* Node::ToDeclaration ()
00259         {
00260             ThrowIfMismatchingType(Base::isDeclaration, this);
00261             return static_cast<Declaration*> (this);
00262         }
00263 
00264         StylesheetReference* Node::ToStylesheetReference ()
00265         {
00266             ThrowIfMismatchingType(Base::isStylesheetReference, this);
00267             return static_cast<StylesheetReference*> (this);
00268         }
